name: Navy Throw Blanket
description: Classic and sophisticated, this navy throw blanket is made of breathable cotton with a herringbone pattern, offering both style and comfort. A timeless addition to any room.

name: Brown Throw Blanket
description: Enhance your space with this rich brown throw blanket. Designed for both style and comfort, it features a velvety texture, adding warmth and elegance to any room.

name: Black Throw Blanket
description: Embrace sophistication with this sleek black throw blanket. Its soft and smooth fabric makes it a versatile addition to your decor, perfect for adding a touch of luxury.
